description: Details required by Condtion 3 (refuse and recycling facilities/storage) and Condition 4 (secure cycle parking facilities) of Planning Permission 19/00117/FUL (Change of use of the ground floor commercial unit (use class D1) to a 2 bed dwelling (use class C3))
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are discharged.
Service parking and deliveries should not cause any damage to the verges or margins, and no parking is allowed on either.
Please submit floor plans and elevations of the previously approved scheme

Inspection:Site inspection carried out in person on 16/11/2023.Assessment:Minor works to self seeded woodland edge trees with no public amenity value and encroaching upon neighbouring property.Recommendation:Approve.
